ygData.subject: Quest Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll try to describe this without spoiling anyone s fun. Has anyone finished Merko s paladin quest (in Freeport).  If you ve done it, you ll know what I m
ygData.messageBody:
I'll try to describe this without spoiling anyone's fun.

Has anyone finished Merko's paladin quest (in Freeport). If you've done
it, you'll know what I'm talking about. It involves Altunic, a shirt, a
venom sack, and a few other items. At the end of all this, Merko tells you
to face a foe in the sewers. It's a Militia guard. If you defeat him,
Merko says he'll "make you a knight", or something similar to that.

My question is: has anyone killed the guard and returned the token to
Merko? The guard says that he is actually a she (and the daughter or
cousin of Merko)...I personally didn't kill her, and she ran away. Now I
can't repeat the quest (Merko says it's something meant for lower knights
when I ask about it). Just curious what happens in the end...(I mean, do
you actually get something, or just exp? I've never read anything anywhere
about this quest).

Thanks in advance!


Ascuro, of The Rathe
